sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Tabs, Tab, Card, CardContent, Button, Chip, Grid, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, Paper, IconButton, Dialog, DialogTitle, DialogContent, DialogActions, TextField } from '@mui/material'; import { Edit, Delete, Visibility } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { UserContext } from '../App'; const ManageContent = () => { const { user } = useContext(UserContext); const [tabValue, setTabValue] = useState(0); const [editDialog, setEditDialog] = useState(false); const [selectedItem, setSelectedItem] = useState(null); // Check if user has access const hasAccess = user && ['HOD', 'DEAN', 'Faculty'].includes(user.role); if (!hasAccess) { return ( Access Denied: Only HOD, DEAN, and Faculty can access this panel. ); } // Mock data - Replace with actual API calls const myAnnouncements = [ { id: 1, title: 'Mid-term Schedule', type: 'Announcement', status: 'approved', created: '2025-11-20', expiry: '2025-12-15' }, { id: 2, title: 'Project Submission', type: 'Announcement', status: 'pending', created: '2025-11-25', expiry: '2025-12-31' }, ]; const myEvents = [ { id: 1, title: 'AI Workshop', type: 'Workshop', date: '2025-12-05', venue: 'Hall A', expiry: '2025-12-06' }, { id: 2, title: 'Tech Fest', type: 'Department Event', date: '2025-12-20', venue: 'Campus Ground', expiry: '2025-12-21' }, ]; const myResources = [ { id: 1, name: 'DBMS Notes.pdf', type: 'PDF', subject: 'Database Systems', subjectCode: 'CSE401', downloads: 45, expiry: '2026-01-15' }, { id: 2, name: 'AI Assignment', type: 'Google Form', subject: 'Artificial Intelligence', subjectCode: 'CSE502', downloads: 30, expiry: '2025-12-10' }, ]; const myProjects = [ { id: 1, title: 'Smart Attendance System', type: 'Project', subject: 'Software Engineering', subjectCode: 'CSE403', dueDate: '2025-12-30', submissions: 12 }, { id: 2, title: 'Data Structures Lab', type: 'Assignment', subject: 'Data Structures', subjectCode: 'CSE301', dueDate: '2025-12-05', submissions: 25 }, ]; const handleEdit = (item, type) => { setSelectedItem({ ...item, contentType: type }); setEditDialog(true); }; const handleDelete = (id, type) => { if (window.confirm(`Are you sure you want to delete this ${type}?`)) { console.log(`Deleting ${type} with id:`, id); // TODO: API call to delete } }; const handleSaveEdit = () => { console.log('Saving edited content:', selectedItem); // TODO: API call to update setEditDialog(false); setSelectedItem(null); }; const renderAnnouncementsTab = () => ( Title Type Status Created Expiry Actions {myAnnouncements.map((item) => ( {item.title} {item.type} {item.created} {item.expiry} handleEdit(item, 'announcement')}> handleDelete(item.id, 'announcement')}> ))}
); const renderEventsTab = () => ( Title Type Date Venue Expiry Actions {myEvents.map((item) => ( {item.title} {item.type} {item.date} {item.venue} {item.expiry} handleEdit(item, 'event')}> handleDelete(item.id, 'event')}> ))}
); const renderResourcesTab = () => ( Resource Name Type Subject Code Downloads Expiry Actions {myResources.map((item) => ( {item.name} {item.type} {item.subject} {item.subjectCode} {item.downloads} {item.expiry} handleEdit(item, 'resource')}> handleDelete(item.id, 'resource')}> ))}
); const renderProjectsTab = () => ( Title Type Subject Code Due Date Submissions Actions {myProjects.map((item) => ( {item.title} {item.type} {item.subject} {item.subjectCode} {item.dueDate} {item.submissions} handleEdit(item, 'project')}> handleDelete(item.id, 'project')}> ))}
); const renderStatsCards = () => ( {myAnnouncements.length} Total Announcements {myEvents.length} Total Events {myResources.length} Total Resources {myProjects.length} Total Projects/Assignments ); return ( Content Management Panel Manage all your created posts, events, resources, and assignments {renderStatsCards()} setTabValue(newValue)}> {tabValue === 0 && renderAnnouncementsTab()} {tabValue === 1 && renderEventsTab()} {tabValue === 2 && renderResourcesTab()} {tabValue === 3 && renderProjectsTab()} {/* Edit Dialog */} setEditDialog(false)} maxWidth="sm" fullWidth> Edit {selectedItem?.contentType} {selectedItem && ( <> setSelectedItem({ ...selectedItem, title: e.target.value, name: e.target.value })} margin="normal" /> setSelectedItem({ ...selectedItem, expiry: e.target.value, expiryDate: e.target.value })} margin="normal" InputLabelProps={{ shrink: true }} /> )} ); }; export default ManageContent;
